page.name: Activity 1: Self-Assessment
page.intro: Complete the following self-assessment of your current knowledge, and practices in using motivation and persistence strategies.
page.content:
Complete the following self-assessment of your current knowledge and practices in using motivation and persistence strategies. For help completing this self-assessment, read Descriptions of 11 Strategies.

After, download the handout, Self-Reflection and Activity Workbook, and complete Activity 1:  Course Overview Self-Assessment. You will use this workbook throughout the course. 

Be sure to read about any strategies for which you scored yourself a 1 or a 2 in the self-assessment.
